attributes.action: Establish the exact boundaries and limits whereby the Government has a right to rule and to intervene in the lives of individuals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In our society, far more than a prevailing belief in the individual liberties of mankind, there is a prevailing assumption of the enshrined right of government to rule. Government rule in the present form is not something that has been around for a long period of our history and is not as natural and established part of humanity as is thought.  A debate is needed, whereby the limits of government rule and its rights to it are established. 

For example:

- To what extent can the government interfere in individual lives, past that of preventing injustice to others?

-To what extent can the government tax someone involuntarily for another’s benefit?

- To what extent can it claim the right to be privy to the private information of an individual, be it relating to identity or actions or other?

and so on.
